description: doc: add FAQ entry about language changes

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=0d411dd887b7 ***

doc: add FAQ entry about language changes

R=golang-dev, dsymonds, r
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/9244043

Maybe phrase the question as a less negative "Will you accept my language
change?"?

On 6 May 2013 14:41, David Symonds <dsymonds@golang.org> wrote:

> Will you accept my language change?


Good idea.

LGTM

https://codereview.appspot.com/9244043/diff/6001/doc/go_faq.html
File doc/go_faq.html (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/9244043/diff/6001/doc/go_faq.html#newcode461
doc/go_faq.html:461: People often suggest improvements to the language–the
this is an en-dash. use an em-dash.

subject: code review 9244043: doc: add FAQ entry about language changes
